data.title: Qatar 2022: Groups, fixtures, stadiums, squads, tickets and more
data.description: See groups and fixtures, read information on stadiums, squads and substitutes, apply for tickets and watch video content on Qatar 2022.

data.title: Schwarzer: Mooy and Hrustic can unlock defences
data.description: Mark Schwarzer speaks to FIFA+ about inspiring Australia to Germany 2006 qualification, their current stars and hopes of success at Qatar 2022.

data.title: Williams brothers set to complete remarkable family journey at World Cup
data.description: Inseparable throughout their lives, Inaki and Nico Williams are preparing to head to the FIFA World Cup - but with different teams

data.title: Klinsmann: Brazil are World Cup favourites in Qatar
data.description: Jurgen Klinsmann speaks to FIFA+ about his FIFA World Cup memories and expectations for Qatar 2022.

data.title: Schmeichel: Denmarkâ€™s journey has been beautiful and moving
data.description: Kasper Schmeichel speaks to FIFA about the team's World Cup prospects and how the loss of a mentor has made him "savour every moment" of their recent rise.
